sys_script.name: NeedIt When needed field date

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>NeedIt When needed field date</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	//Instantiate NeedItUtils, call isDatePast, pass u_when_needed
	var needItUtils = new NeedItUtils();
	var isPast = needItUtils.isDatePast(current.u_when_needed);
	
	//If isDatePast returns true, date is in past
	if (isPast == true) {
		gs.addErrorMessage("When needed date cannot be in the past. Your request has not been saved to the database.");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
	
	//Pass When needed field value to isDateToday method in NeedItUtils
	var isToday = needItUtils.isDateToday(current.u_when_needed);
	
	//
	
	//If isDateToday method returns true, When needed date is today
	if (isToday == true) {
		gs.addErrorMessage("You cannot submit NeedIt requests for today.");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-28 20:11:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>df24013607541110609af0269c1ed051</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedIt When needed field date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_df24013607541110609af0269c1ed051</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-30 15:56:56</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=df24013607541110609af0269c1ed051"/></record_update>
